Reviews.Title: a lot packed in this phone
Reviews.Author: C. Pedersen
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to test out T-mobile.  I use a Galaxy Nexus with Verizon.  I was pleasantly surprised at the feature packed into this phone.  I thought the colors in the screen were nice.  The screen is responsive.  I really liked the "in car" feature of voice to text.  Phone feels solid.  Never used the camera.  Reception to signals is excellent.Finding a physical QWERTY phone is more and more difficult.  This is a pretty good option.  HTC is a good phone manufacturer.  I do see another company is making a MyTouch for T-mobile now.  It is by Huawei.  That phone is junk.

Reviews.Title: only worked for 1 day!
Reviews.Author: robbie
Reviews.Content: as a guy who goes through phones all the time i have to say that this phone was very nice bu what made me rate it a 1 is well because it stoped working after 1 day it glitched out and then refused to turn on

Ultra-fast 4G-enabled, Android 2.3-powered smartphone with 3.7-inch LCD display, side-sliding QWERTY keyboard, and dual-core 1.2 GHz processor
